title: new portal with typographical resources
content:
Hi all, just to introduce you to the rank ( [http://the-rank.com](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418234638/http:/the-rank.com/ "http://the-rank.com")), a portal with a lot of commercial and free typo resources.  
A good tool for our everyday work...  
thanks...
author: ernestoalegre

comments.content:
Ernesto,

nice site, btw this a working [link.](http://web.archive.org/web/20150418234638/http:/the-rank.com/)

Yes, I know... I´m a stupid...  
ha ha... sorry and thank you...
